imdb.plot outline: Menu is the Multi-Electronic Networked User system. An artificial intelligence primarily seen as a floating holographic head and hands. As companion to Don and Kera in My Life as a Video Game; Menu gets an interesting perspective on the world around him. He takes his unique look at things and proceeds to tell the audience directly his perspective on events and what exactly Menu does in his spare time.
imdb.title: Menu's Vlog
plot: Menu (Brent Black) takes on his own personal vlog channel summarising and talking about the story of My Life as a Video Game from the perspective of the supercomputer A.I.::Petros L. Ioannou

Menu is the Multi-Electronic Networked User system. An artificial intelligence primarily seen as a floating holographic head and hands. As companion to Don and Kera in My Life as a Video Game; Menu gets an interesting perspective on the world around him. He takes his unique look at things and proceeds to tell the audience directly his perspective on events and what exactly Menu does in his spare time.::Petros L. Ioannou
